title: Goal 1: 1. Title - Design a Real-time Fraud Detection Syst...
description:
1. Title - Design a Real-time Fraud Detection System for Financial Services Company (H0):
   Description - The goal is to design an efficient real-time fraud detection system that can handle millions of transactions per second with sub-50ms latency and use machine learning models effectively in detecting suspicious patterns, anomalies. 
    Success Criteria: A robust model capable of identifying significant instances within a short time frame should be able to identify false positives or negatives at the same rate as real frauds occur over long periods (95% accuracy). The system must integrate seamlessly with existing banking systems and payment processors, provide explainable AI decisions for regulatory compliance.
    Estimated Effort - 4-6 hours per priority level based on feasibility of design & implementation + time to refine the model if necessary + 2 weeks total development effort (H0: ~15~). Priority High as this is a critical component in financial services company's operations.
    Scope and Resolution - The team will have 3-4 days per priority level of completion, with additional time reserved for refinement & testing the system under normal circumstances before deployment (H0: ~2 weeks~).
